title: The Lasting Impact of The Bogle Effect
itunes:title: The Lasting Impact of The Bogle Effect
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior ETF Analyst Eric Balchunas discusses his book The Bogle Effect: How John Bogle and Vanguard Turned Wall Street Inside Out and Saved Investors Trillions.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
